title: A biomass hydrogel solar evaporator based on low-grade tobacco leaves for water evaporation and thermoelectric conversion applications
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00005F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Zuoyu Wang, Lu Han, Gaolei Xi, Tao Jia, Yi Liu, Xiao He, Hongxia Wang, Bin Li
A low-cost and eco-friendly solar steam generator was designed by combining polyvinyl alcohol hydrogels with low-grade tobacco leaves biomass photothermal materials, which apply for water evaporation and thermoelectric conversion.
